definitions.text: be owned by; be in the possession of
be in the right place or situation
examples: Let's put health care where it belongs--under the control of the government

definitions.text: be rightly classified in a class or category
examples: The whales belong among the mammals

definitions.text: be a member, adherent, inhabitant, etc. (of a group, organization, or place)
examples: They belong to the same political party
the uniform looks like it belonged to a museum collection
